job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <ul><li>Outstanding quantitative background. Minimum of a master's degree (Ph.D. preferred) in Computer Science, Statistics, Math, Physics or other related technical fields.</li><li>7 + years of professional experience in developing AI/ML or statistical models and solutions.&nbsp;</li><li>Deep understanding of statistics, machine learning techniques, their mathematical concepts, and industry trends.</li><li>Solid production engineering development experience with Python, SQL, Sklean, TensorFlow, PyTorch or any of the prevailing AI/ML frameworks.</li><li>Proficient understanding of ETL processes, model lifecycle management, and engineering design standard methodologies.</li></ul>
